name: ArbiRoul Casino Chip
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
ROUL is the token for the ArbiRoul Ecosystem. The goal of ArbiRoul is to create a fair, transparent, and fun betting platform on the Arbitrum blockchain.
This token can be used in House edge staking, and liquidity farming, as well as distributed as casino revenue share.
ROUL is designed to utilize deflationary mechanics such as burning. It is integrated into the ArbiRoul on-chain decentralized casino games. It is required in order to play the game and gets burnt upon every bet placed.
The token can be paired together with ETH and staked in the house edge farm for the purposes of earning real yield via the Casino DApps.
